game.name: After the Curtain Call
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: After the Curtain Call is a first-person, narrative puzzle game, which holds the story of Yujin who thinks her life as a play. She uses a special 'dimension camera' to switch the dimension of objects and solve puzzles. Through the journey, she face the truth that was forgotten...
